item.title: Hi, I'm Changhao
item.description: Toronto, ON, Canada | changhao dot song at alumni dot utoronto dot ca | www.songchanghao.com Education University of Toronto, Computer Science (BA) with Distinction, 2018.09 - 2022.12 Program: Specialist in Computer Science (focus: AI, Game Design), and enrolled in PEY (Professional Experience Year) Co-op program at the university Work Experience SOTI Inc. Software Developer, 2021.09 - Present Gap to finish my study, 2022.9 - 2023.01 Software Developer (Intern), 2021.09 - 2022.

item.title: Her
item.description: The first story is about you, and me… I was a University of Toronto student studying ComputerÂ Science (at least that’s what you guys could describe me for now). Although I do not have any physics background, I was recently (just in one week to describe in human-readable time) drawn to the physics world and could not stop thinking of the largest thing human beings could ever think of and the smallest thing human beings could ever think of.

item.title: CoRider
item.description: A company-wide carpooling app built using Flutter.

item.title: UofT_CourseScript
item.description: A fully free open-source script written in Python with Selenium (automating web applications) to help UofT students get popular courses securely.

item.title: Academix
item.description: An iOS app that helps students in both academic and social aspects.
